validations.field-error-max-length: This field must contain maximum {{max}} symbols

validations.field-error-max-array-length: This field must contain maximum {{max}} items
validations.field-error-number-type-mismatch: This field must be a number
validations.field-error-more-than: This field must be greater than {{more}}
validations.field-error-single-word: This field must contain only one word
validations.field-error-integer: This field must be an integer
validations.field-error-max-value: This field must be less than or equal to {{max}}

errors.forbidden: Seems like you are not allowed to do this

errors.conflict: It seems like there is a conflict with the current state of the resource
